mapper.select: SELECT cs.student_id as student_id,cs.nickname as nickname, COUNT(csc.student_seq) as count_connection,use_yn,AVG(cess.score) as avg_score FROM csat_student cs,csat_student_connection csc,csat_exam_student_score cess WHERE cs.student_seq = csc.student_seq OR cs.student_seq = cess.student_seq

SELECT TO_CHAR(create_date, 'hh') as hour,COUNT(student_seq) as count_join FROM csat_student WHERE create_date <= TO_DATE(#{ymd}, 'yyyymmdd') AND create_date + 1 > TO_DATE(#{ymd}, 'yyyymmdd') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(create_date, 'hh')

SELECT TO_CHAR(create_date, 'dd') AS day, COUNT(student_seq) AS count_join FROM csat_student WHERE create_date <= TO_DATE(#{ym}, 'yyyymm') AND TO_DATE(#{ym}, 'yyyymm') >= DATEADD(month, 1, create_date) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(create_date, 'dd')

SELECT TO_CHAR(create_date, 'mm') AS day, COUNT(student_seq) AS count_join FROM csat_student WHERE create_date <= TO_DATE(#{year}, 'yyyy') AND TO_DATE(#{year}, 'yyyy') >= DATEADD(year, 1, create_date) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(create_date, 'mm')
